mapper.select: /*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectNoticeSingle */ SELECT seq , lang , notice_gbn , title , content , writer , write_date , view_cnt , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM notice WHERE seq = #{seq}

/*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectSipaNewsSingle */ SELECT seq , lang , notice_gbn , title , content , writer , write_date , view_cnt , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM sipa_news WHERE seq = #{seq}

/*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectEventSingle */ SELECT seq , lang , title , writer , write_date , location , year , start_date , end_date , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM event WHERE seq = #{seq}

/*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectFaqSingle */ SELECT seq , lang , title , content , writer , write_date , view_cnt , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM faq WHERE seq = #{seq}

/*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectAscdirectorsSingle */ SELECT seq , lang , company_name , company_ceo , company_homepage , company_tel , company_address , company_business_type , company_business_item , logo , intro , field , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM ascdirectors WHERE seq = #{seq}

/*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectAdviserSingle */ SELECT seq , gbn , lang , position , name , organization , depart , homepage , tel , brief_description , represent_image , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM adviser WHERE seq = #{seq}

/*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectConsultationSingle */ SELECT seq , gbn , lang , position , name , organization , depart , homepage , tel , brief_description , represent_image , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM adviser WHERE seq = #{seq}

/*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectCompanySingle */ SELECT seq , gbn , lang , company_name , company_ceo , company_homepage , company_tel , company_address , company_business_type , company_business_item , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM company WHERE seq = #{seq}

/*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectPartnershipSingle */ SELECT seq , lang , company_name , company_ceo , company_homepage , company_tel , company_address , company_business_type , company_business_item , logo , intro , field , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM partnership WHERE seq = #{seq}

/* com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectFileUserIdList */ SELECT id , user_id , full_file_path , full_path , folder_path , full_file_name , uuid , file_name , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM file WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND file_yn = 'Y'
